display_name: How often do sensations occur - Present
description: On average, how often do you experience these unpleasant sensations in your legs or the urge to move your legs?
domain: 0=every day, 1=4-5 days/week, 2=2-3 days/week, 3=1 day/week, 4=1-3 days/month, 5=less than 1/day month, -55 =don't know
